meanings.definition: To perceive through touch or physical sensation.
meanings.sent1: I feel the soft blanket with my hands.
meanings.sent2: She likes to feel the warm sun on her face.
meanings.sent3: I feel like a detective trying to solve the mystery of the missing sock.
meanings.sent4: The music made me feel like I was floating on a cloud.
meanings.sent5: The rough texture of the rock made me feel like I was touching sandpaper.

meanings.definition: To experience an emotion or sensation.
meanings.sent1: When I see puppies, I feel happy inside.
meanings.sent2: He feels nervous before giving a speech.
meanings.sent3: I feel like a superhero when I wear my cape.
meanings.sent4: Her words made me feel like I was walking on air.
meanings.sent5: The surprise party made me feel like a burst of confetti.

meanings.definition: To have a belief or opinion.
meanings.sent1: I feel that honesty is important in all relationships.
meanings.sent2: She feels that hard work pays off in the end.
meanings.sent3: I feel like a fortune teller predicting the future.
meanings.sent4: His words made me feel like I was standing on solid ground.
meanings.sent5: The painting made me feel like I was looking at a masterpiece.
